titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the Nation during Public Service Recognition Week, May 1 through 7, 2011.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2091-2092)
Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. (text of measure as introduced: CR S2091)

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 35.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
